data.summary: Normalized replay diagnostics artifact/evidence path handling for portability using stable relative refs where possible without changing required manifest fields.
path_portability_changes: Comparator evidence artifact refs now deterministic scenario artifact refs (baseline.norm.json#scenario:<id>, candidate.norm.json#scenario:<id>).
Gate annotation evidence refs normalize path separators to stable forward-slash form.
Report evidence handles normalize refs and writeReplayReport now returns workspace-relative paths when workspacePath is provided.
Replay CLI gate/report artifact outputs now return workspace-relative/stable paths when workspacePath is available.
tests_added_or_updated: Comparator test asserts deterministic artifact_refs format.
Report writer test covers workspace-relative output paths.
Gate annotation test covers windows-path evidence ref normalization.
